bonus_task_detail_1: Check in RewardMe every day to get more bonus points.
bonus_task_detail_4: Receive the latest news on our channels
converter_detail: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Urna, ut odio nulla posuere turpis mauris purus.
missing_receipt_detail: Please provide the detail of the missing email receipt as much as possible.
more_offers_selected: MORE THAN {numberOfOffer} {offerCount, plural, =0 {brand} one {brand} other {brands}} SELECTED
linked_emails_detail: It may take some time to analyze your shopping e-receipts. We will notify you once it’s done.
welcome_detail: RewardMe is a cashback app that let you earn points after online/offline shopping, in-app purchase or subscribe to online services.
select_offer_details: We also provide a special offer for everyone. You can choose your favorite or frequently spend brands. The cashback rate depends on your membership level.
confirm_select_offer_details: Once you shop in these {number_of_offers} brands, you will earn cash back.
please_select_brands: Please choose {number_of_offers} brands/services to earn points with each time you spend there.
edit_prefernece_afterward: You can fill in later in profile page
let_us_know: LET’S US KNOW MORE ABOUT YOU
bind_more_email_later: You can bind more emails later in profile.
dont_worry: Don’t worry. We only detect email receipts, not your personal emails.
we_hope_to_provide: We hope to provide better in-app experience and tailor more offers and redeem options in the future.
we_will_send_otp: We’ll send you a verification code to your phone via text message.
we_have_sent_otp: We have sent you the verification code to {phone_number}. Didn’t receive the code?
claim_gift_on_birthday: You can claim gift on your birthday
login_in_agree_terms_and_policy: By logging in your email address, you agree with RewardMe’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
setting_up_agree_terms_and_policy: By setting up the account, you agree with RewardMe’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
it_might_take_some_time: It might take some time, we will notify you once it’s done.
turn_on_notifications_to_learn: Turn on notifications to receive news about new rewards, latest promotional events and limited offers.
account_setup_done: Your account has been set up
change_cashback_perference_later: RewardMe provides 2 types of cashback. You can change the perference afterwards.
enter_pin_to_verify: Enter the pin again to verify
pin_verification_fail:
Verification failed.
Please enter a new pin again.
edit_preference_in_30_days: You can edit your favorite brand preference once in 30 days. You will receive cashback based on your membership level.
choose_more_brand_when_upgrade: You can choose more brands when your membership is upgraded.
get_reward_from_brands: Choose your favorite brands with the special cashback rate.
edited_in_30_days: You have edited the preference in recent 30 days. You can edit the preference after {date}.
error_code_100: System Error, Please try again later.
error_code_201: User already exist. Please sign in.
